post.text: Beautiful evening in Kinston, North Carolina - thank you! Get out and VOTE!! You can watch tonight's rally here below! LETS MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!

comment.author: Cody
comment.text: we love you Mr Trump , I will be voting for you as will the rest of my family, Thank you for all you do, Everyone go vote Trump , Lets Landslide this.

replies.author: Joshua
replies.text: The Washington Establishment is frightened of the truth that Donald J. Trump speaks.

replies.author: Joshua
replies.text: Stop voting for a Party, Race or Gender! Think about your Life & who's going to make it better. Not Words but Actions. We the People have a chance to take back our Government. We've a man who is Working so Hard for US wanting to do just that. This Dirty Corrupted Democratic Group is doing ever Trick they can to stop us & Trump. Vote for Donald J. Trump
